name: 葛瑞斐　Office Hours
objective:
通過每週閱讀和課堂討論，本課程將幫助培養學生的英語會話、聽力和閱讀能力。 在練習這些技能的過程中，我們將專注於理解西方語言和文化的核心思想，從而理解西方文化中的人（他們的價值觀、動機、原則）的核心思想。 [本課程過去的主題包括：怪物與人類； 喜劇和幽默； 善惡的本質； 西部英雄； 棒球與社會； 美的理念和重要性； 探索與發現]。 檢查圍繞這一主題的論文和電影，我們將考慮這個重要的想法告訴我們關於西方社會及其人民的什麼。
Through weekly readings and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English conversation, listening, and reading skills.  In the course of practicing such skills, we will focus on an idea central to understanding the language and the culture of the West, and thus an idea central to understanding the people (their values, motivations, principles) of Western culture.   [Past topics for this course include: Monsters and the Human; Comedy and Humor; The Nature of Good and Evil; The Hero in the West; Baseball and Society; The Idea and the Importance of Beauty; Exploration and Discovery].   Examining essays and films centered around such a topic, we will consider what the significant idea tells us about Western society and its people.
schedule:
Week 　　1: Introduction
　　
2-5: Unit 1 - Definitions

6-8: Unit 2 – In the News

9: Midterm week

10-13: Unit 3 – History 

14-17: Unit 4 – Popular Culture
　　
18: Finals week
